articles.description: Another remarkable summer transfer window closes with a number of new spending records set.
articles.title: Premier League clubs spend £2.36bn in record-breaking summer

articles.description: Chief football writer Phil McNulty looks at the big questions still to answer now the dust has settled on another hectic transfer window.
articles.title: Six questions to emerge from a record transfer window

articles.description: England take a 2-0 lead in the T20 series with a 95-run thrashing of New Zealand at Old Trafford.
articles.title: Dominant England thrash New Zealand in second T20

articles.description: Tottenham sign forward Brennan Johnson from Nottingham Forest for a fee in excess of £45m.
articles.title: Spurs sign Johnson from Forest in £45m-plus deal

articles.description: Liverpool sign midfielder Ryan Gravenberch from Bayern Munich in a deal worth in the region of £34.3m (40m euros).
articles.title: Liverpool complete £34m Gravenberch signing from Bayern

articles.description: West Ham continue their strong start and remain unbeaten as Jarrod Bowen grabs his third goal of the season.
articles.title: Bowen strikes again as Luton lose first home game

articles.description: Watch the best moments from Harry Brook & Jonny Bairstow as their impressive batting display helps England thrash New Zealand by 95 runs to go two up in the four-match T20 series.
articles.title: Watch Brook & Bairstow's batting masterclass as England thrash NZ

articles.description: Check out all the significant signings and departures on transfer deadline day in the Premier League, EFL and Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Transfers - all the done deals on deadline day

articles.description: Al-Ittihad are prepared to bid £200m for Liverpool's Mohamed Salah, Lazio decide against signing Mason Greenwood before he joins Getafe, plus more.
articles.title: Al-Ittihad prepared to bid £200m for Salah - Saturday's gossip

articles.description: Manchester United sign Fiorentina midfielder Sofyan Amrabat on a season-long loan with an option to buy.
articles.title: Man Utd sign Amrabat on loan from Fiorentina
